des:
With the i.link skill for Alexa, you can control a wild range of smart devices with your voice, including lights, switches, sockets and so on.
Here's a step by step guide:
1. Download i.link app from Google Play or App Store.
2. Turn on your smart devices and connect them with "i.link" app. Rename your device, such as my switch.
3. Type in or search "i.link" in Alexa app. Click ENABLE TO USE and login to link your i.link account..
4. Say: "Alexa, discover devices". Keep waiting utill you hear "Discover is completed".
5. Now, you can control your smart devices with your voice.
You can say:
Alexa, turn on the switch.
Alexa, turn off the switch.
